borrow(address,uint256,uint256,uint16,ad.details: Allows users to borrow a specific amount of the reserve currency, provided that the borrower already deposited enough collateral.

params.interestRateMode: the interest rate mode at which the user wants to borrow. Can be 0 (STABLE) or 1 (VARIABLE)*

deposit(address,uint256,address,uint16).details: deposits The underlying asset into the reserve. A corresponding amount of the overlying asset (aTokens) is minted.

params.referralCode: integrators are assigned a referral code and can potentially receive rewards.*

flashLoan(address,address[],uint256[],ui.details: allows smartcontracts to access the liquidity of the pool within one transaction, as long as the amount taken plus a fee is returned. NOTE There are security concerns for developers of flashloan receiver contracts that must be kept into consideration. For further details please visit https://developers.aave.com

params.amounts: the amount requested for this flashloan
params.assets: the address of the principal reserve
params.params: a bytes array to be sent to the flashloan executor
params.receiver: The address of the contract receiving the funds. The receiver should implement the IFlashLoanReceiver interface.
params.referralCode: the referral code of the caller*

liquidationCall(address,address,address,.details: users can invoke this function to liquidate an undercollateralized position.

params.purchaseAmount: the amount of principal that the liquidator wants to repay
params.receiveAToken: true if the liquidators wants to receive the aTokens, false if he wants to receive the underlying asset directly*
params.reserve: the address of the principal reserve

repay(address,uint256,uint256,address).details: the target user is defined by onBehalfOf. If there is no repayment on behalf of another account, onBehalfOf must be equal to msg.sender.
repay(address,uint256,uint256,address).notice: repays a borrow on the specific reserve, for the specified amount (or for the whole amount, if uint256(-1) is specified).

params.amount: the amount to repay, or uint256(-1) if the user wants to repay everything
params.onBehalfOf: the address for which msg.sender is repaying.*
params.reserve: the address of the reserve on which the user borrowed

setUserUseReserveAsCollateral(address,bo.details: allows depositors to enable or disable a specific deposit as collateral.

params.useAsCollateral: true if the user wants to user the deposit as collateral, false otherwise.*

swapBorrowRateMode(address,uint256).details: borrowers can user this function to swap between stable and variable borrow rate modes.

params.rateMode: the rate mode that the user wants to swap*
params.reserve: the address of the reserve on which the user borrowed

params.amount: the underlying amount to be redeemed
params.to: address that will receive the underlying*
